plugins.name: team
plugins.description: Dynamic multi-agent team orchestration. Spawns specialized teams (PM, Designer, Devs, QA, Oracle) with 6-phase workflow, TDD enforcement, and cross-model verification.

plugins.name: claude-oracle
plugins.description: Cross-model verification. Bridges Claude with Codex (GPT-5.3) for code review second opinions, alternative implementations, and architecture validation. Read-only consultant.
